Desc.entry: Has 57 beds, 19 of which are reserved for intermediate care and 19 for Elderly Mentally Infirm (EMI)/dementia sufferers. Registered for younger disabled. Approved for accommodation of renal specialist care by NHS Sheffield. Contracted placements with NHS Sheffield for convalescent and intermediate care. This care home is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.

ContactName.entry: Mrs Trudi Ashmore, Manager/Mr Raj Kanani

category.entry: CARE HOMES WITH NURSING FOR OLDER PEOPLE (NURSING HOMES)
